TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

summary.span: Determina i file di output per riferimenti a progetti non MSBuild.

span.span: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` esegue la ricerca di una proprietà speciale impostata dall'attività di [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE per l'elenco di GUID di progetto e di output associati.The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. L'IDE di pre-consente di risolvere solo non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti e in questo modo separa [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetto i riferimenti non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti.The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references. L'IDE restituisce l'elenco di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti come UnresolvedProjectReferences.The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. In questo modo l'attività usi più potenti [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] meccanismi per modificare solo il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti, ad esempio al progetto.This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as. la chiamata a destinazioni specifiche di riferimenti per ottenere il nome del file manifesto, che non sarebbe possibile con un elenco misto di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] e non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] i riferimenti al progetto.calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreresolvedProjectOutputs { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Ottiene o imposta una stringa XML che contiene gli output di progetto risolti.

span.span: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.

value.span: Stringa XML che contiene gli output di progetto risolti.

span.span: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ ResolvedOutputPaths { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: Ottiene o imposta percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi dei riferimenti al progetto originali.

span.span: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

value.span: Percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi dei riferimenti al progetto originali.

span.span: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ UnresolvedProjectReferences { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: Ottiene o imposta elementi di riferimento al progetto in formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

span.span: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

value.span: Elementi di riferimento al progetto in formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

span.span: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Poiché [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] solo pre-risolve non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti, gli elementi di riferimento di progetto che non è possibile risolvere utilizzando l'elenco prerisolto di output presenti il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
